com.b2international.snowowl.datastore.server.oplock

Class AbstractOperationLockManager<C extends Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.b2international.snowowl.datastore.server.oplock.AbstractOperationLockManager<C>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOperationLockManager<C>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReentrantOperationLockManager

    public abstract class AbstractOperationLockManager<C extends Serializable>
extends Object
implements IOperationLockManager<C>
    An abstract superclass of IOperationLockManager providing common methods.

    • Method Detail

      • lock

        public void lock(C context,
                 long timeoutMillis,
                 IOperationLockTarget firstTarget,
                 IOperationLockTarget... restTargets)
          throws OperationLockException,
                 InterruptedException
        Description copied from interface: IOperationLockManager
        Locks one or more targets for the specified lock context.
        Specified by:
        lock in interface IOperationLockManager<C extends Serializable>
        Parameters:
        context - the lock context (may not be null)
        timeoutMillis - the maximum allowed time in milliseconds in which this call may block (must be IOperationLockManager.NO_TIMEOUT, zero or positive)
        firstTarget - the first (or only) target to lock (may not be null)
        restTargets - subsequent targets to lock (may not be null; individual elements may not be null)
        Throws:
        OperationLockException - when one or more locks for the given targets can not be acquired for some reason
        InterruptedException - if waiting for the requested locks to be acquired is interrupted

      • lock

        public void lock(C context,
                 long timeoutMillis,
                 Iterable<? extends IOperationLockTarget> targets)
          throws OperationLockException,
                 InterruptedException
        Description copied from interface: IOperationLockManager
        Locks one or more targets for the specified lock context.
        Specified by:
        lock in interface IOperationLockManager<C extends Serializable>
        Parameters:
        context - the lock context (may not be null)
        timeoutMillis - the maximum allowed time in milliseconds in which this call may block (must be IOperationLockManager.NO_TIMEOUT, zero or positive)
        targets - the targets to lock (may not be null; can be empty)
        Throws:
        OperationLockException - when one or more locks for the given targets can not be acquired for some reason
        InterruptedException - if waiting for the requested locks to be acquired is interrupted

      • unlock

        public void unlock(C context,
                   IOperationLockTarget firstTarget,
                   IOperationLockTarget... restTargets)
            throws OperationLockException
        Description copied from interface: IOperationLockManager
        Unlocks one or more targets with the specified lock context.
        Specified by:
        unlock in interface IOperationLockManager<C extends Serializable>
        Parameters:
        context - the lock context (may not be null)
        firstTarget - the first (or only) target to unlock (may not be null)
        restTargets - subsequent targets to unlock (may not be null; individual elements may not be null)
        Throws:
        OperationLockException - when one or more locks for the given targets could not be released for some reason

        targets - the targets to unlock (may not be null; can be empty)
        Throws:
